import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"modifyFileTags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/files/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add or remove file tags in bulk. Only 100 files are supported per request.
      

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tagsToRemove":{"default":[],"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"User defined unique identifier for the tag"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Id of the tag type"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"User defined display value for the tag"}},"required":["type","value"],"title":"Tag"}},"tagsToAdd":{"default":[],"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"User defined unique identifier for the tag"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Id of the tag type"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"User defined display value for the tag"}},"required":["type","value"],"title":"Tag"}},"files":{"minItems":1,"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"dry_run":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, perform a dry run without actually modifying file tags"}},"required":["tagsToRemove","tagsToAdd","files"],"title":"FileTagUpdateBody"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":""}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
